mapper.sql: Shift, OilCan, TakeDate, OilNo, OilName, ToOilHigh, ToOilL, InOilL, HoOilHigh, HoOilL, SaleL, AccountDate, CanRealL, HeightWater, WaterL, TranStatus
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(ToOilL) AS ToOilL, sum(HoOilL) as HoOilL,OilNo FROM oss_daily_tankshift WHERE shift =#{shift} GROUP BY OilNo
SELECT SUM(CanRealL) AS CanRealL FROM oss_daily_tankshift WHERE Shift=(SELECT MAX(shift) FROM oss_daily_tankshift WHERE Shift LIKE #{shift})
mapper.insert: insert into oss_daily_tankshift (Shift, OilCan, TakeDate, OilNo, OilName, ToOilHigh, ToOilL, InOilL, HoOilHigh, HoOilL, SaleL, AccountDate, CanRealL, HeightWater, WaterL, TranStatus) values (#{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{takedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oilname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tooilhigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tooill,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{inoill,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{hooilhigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{hooill,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{salel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{accountdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{canreall,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{heightwater,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{waterl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update oss_daily_tankshift
TakeDate = #{takedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OilName = #{oilname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ToOilHigh = #{tooilhigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ToOilL = #{tooill,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
InOilL = #{inoill,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
HoOilHigh = #{hooilhigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
HoOilL = #{hooill,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SaleL = #{salel,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
AccountDate = #{accountdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CanRealL = #{canreall,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
HeightWater = #{heightwater,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
WaterL = #{waterl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TranStatus = #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Shift = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and OilCan = #{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update oss_daily_tankshift set TakeDate = #{takedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OilNo = #{oilno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OilName = #{oilname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ToOilHigh = #{tooilhigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ToOilL = #{tooill,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, InOilL = #{inoill,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HoOilHigh = #{hooilhigh,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HoOilL = #{hooill,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SaleL = #{salel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, AccountDate = #{accountdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CanRealL = #{canreall,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, HeightWater = #{heightwater,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, WaterL = #{waterl,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TranStatus = #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Shift = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and OilCan = #{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM oss_daily_tankshift WHERE Shift>=#{minshift} AND Shift <=#{maxshift}
SELECT * FROM oss_daily_tankshift WHERE Shift = #{shift} AND AccountDate IS null
SELECT Shift FROM oss_daily_tankshift WHERE AccountDate IS NOT NULL ORDER By AccountDate DESC,shift DESC limit 1
SELECT ToOilL FROM oss_daily_tankshift WHERE Shift=#{shift} AND OilCan =#{oilcan}
SELECT SUM(ToOilL) FROM oss_daily_tankshift WHERE Shift=#{shift} AND OilNo = #{oilno}
